titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for reuoking the commission concerning archery.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie, And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Arms with rose and thistle at top.
" Giuen at Our Court at Woodstocke, the xxiij. of August, in the seuenth yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
